Why work with us?

We are a European company that has its roots entrenched in Indonesia. We understand the local as well as the international side of the production process and supply chain. Extensive experience, unique designs, control over the production process, understanding the needs of different markets, clear communication and innovation in a dynamic furniture industry are a few sharp advantages that we offer.

Read more

We are an international company: European origin based in Indonesia

We operate in different areas and cultures. Being a fusion of a European and an Indonesian company and also living and having customers and shops internationally makes us aware of the different cultures and values on both ends of the world. We can look from both the International as well as the local perspective and from both the production as well as the consumer’s point of view. This smoothens many layers in design, communication, logistics and production.

Our production takes place in our Elements Factory

ByE works together with Elements Factory based in Indonesia. Therefore it can control its development and production processes and implement its own vision and values. We are there from the initial design until the finished product. Our skillful team members work closely together with the craftsmen to get the right products. Being present at the source gives us control over every step in the process; from the sourcing of materials all the way through the production process.

Updated collection every year

ByE develops and launches a new collection every year with fresh items. The collection takes  into account and incorporates the worldwide interior trends whilst keeping its own authentic and recognizable style. We display the new collection at the international furniture fair and send our loyal customers a catalogue before displaying the new collection at the fair.

Experience is what we’re known for

Bastiaan has already been designing and producing ‘white label furniture’  for renowned and successful international furniture brands for years. The extensive experience of developing and producing for other brands has enabled us to see that our designs and products are very well received by end consumers in many different countries and markets.

Relatively low MOQ’s per product

Because our products are crafted by hand we have relatively low minimum order requirements for our product categories. This makes it easier to choose a variety of different products to fill up a single container.

ByE keeps up and implements the modern trends, ensuring that the collection appeals to the target audience.

Our collection consists of a broad range of different products and combinations of materials

ByE works together with Elements Factory based in Indonesia. Therefore it can control its development and production processes and implement its own vision and values. We are there from the initial design until the finished product. Our skillful team members work closely together with the craftsmen to get the right products. Being present at the source gives us control over every step in the process; from the sourcing of materials all the way through the production process.

See the full collection in our catalogue

In our catalogue you will see our most recent range of furniture and accessories that you can order and brand with your own label.

About by E

ByE provides an expanding collection of natural, timeless interior that is produced at the source. We brand the products with your own label and ship them to anywhere in the world.
